job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job Description: Production Support / Application Support, Linux / Windows / SQL â Expert ;Desired Skills:SQL experts in Unix/Linux Production Support profiles.Â SQL is the main deciding factorUnix â 8/10Windows â How to login, IIS, Services, Security policy, Computer management â 8/10SQL â Strong knowledge (Writing queries, Stored procedure trouble-shooting, Statistics, DDL, DML knowledge, transact-SQL, Oracle) â 9/10Monitoring â 8/10Analytical â Needs to understand production issue scenarios and approach to engage and resolve â 8/10Communication â 8/10Â Good to have:Scheduling tools â 7/10Security Certificate Management â 7/10SFTP, SSH protocol â 7/10Linux âAdvancedSQL â AdvancedWindows â AdvancedScripting (such as Shell/Perl or PowerShell)Knowledge of production application environments and components including database design and performance (such as Oracle, MS SQL); virtual servers (such as VMWare); monitoring platforms (such as Geneos); application resiliency automation; scheduling tools (such as Autosys); load balancing (such as DR pairs, CNAMES, A-Record); transmission protocols (such as SFTP, NDM); Messaging tools (such as MQ, KAFKA)BS or MS in Computer Science highly desiredService Now â a plusInvestment Banking Financial Services (such as institutional markets, post trade technology, prime brokerage and fund services) a plus.
